trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control to display a list of items.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en Windows-kontroll for å vise en liste med elementer.

trans-unit.source: The ListBox control enables you to display a list of items to the user that the user can select by clicking.
trans-unit.target: Listen kan du vise en liste med elementer for brukeren som brukeren kan velge ved å klikke.

trans-unit.source: A ListBox control can provide single or multiple selections using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En liste har én eller flere utvalg ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ListBox also provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A> property to enable the display of items in columns instead of a straight vertical list of items.
trans-unit.target: Liste gir deg også den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A>til å aktivere visningen av elementer i kolonnene i stedet for en loddrett rett liste med elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A>

trans-unit.source: With this, the control can display more visible items and the user no longer needs to scroll to an item.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen kan vise flere synlige elementer med, og brukeren ikke lenger trenger å bla til et element.

trans-unit.source: Typically, Windows handles the task of drawing the items to display in the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: Windows behandler vanligvis arbeidsoppgaven for tegning av elementene som skal vises i listen.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> events so you can override the automatic drawing that Windows provides and draw the items yourself.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>egenskapen og referansen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>hendelser slik at du kan overstyre automatisk tegning som Windows gir og tegne elementene selv.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use owner-drawn ListBox controls to display variable-height items, images, or a different color or font for the text of each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke eieren tegnes liste kontroller for å vise variabel høyde elementer, bilder, eller en annen farge eller skriften for teksten for hvert element i listen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A> also help you draw your own items.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A>også å tegne dine egne elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to display and selection functionality, the ListBox also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the ListBox and to find text within the items of the list.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til å vise og valg funksjonalitet inneholder liste funksjoner som gjør det mulig å legge til elementer i listen effektivt og finne tekst i elementene i listen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods enable you to add a large number of items to the ListBox without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>metoder gjør det mulig å legge til et stort antall elementer i listen uten kontrollen blir oppdatert hver gang et element som er lagt til i listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>metoder gjør det mulig å søke etter et element i listen som inneholder en bestemt søkestreng.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> properties provide access to the three collections that are used by the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>Egenskaper gir tilgang til tre samlinger som brukes av listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table outlines the three collections used by the ListBox and their use within the control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver tre samlinger brukes av liste og bruken i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: |Collection class|Use within the ListBox| |----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>|Contains all items contained in the ListBox control.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>|Contains a collection of the selected items which is a subset of the items contained in the ListBox control.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>|Contains a collection of the selected indexes, which is a subset of the indexes of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.
trans-unit.target: | Samlingsklasse | Bruk i liste | |----------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>| Inneholder alle elementer i listen. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>| Inneholder en samling av de valgte elementene som er et delsett av elementene i listen. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>| Inneholder en samling av de valgte indeksene, som er et delsett av indekser for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items that are selected.| The following three examples show the three indexed collections that the ListBox class supports.
trans-unit.target: Disse indeksene angi elementer som er valgt. | De følgende tre eksemplene viser tre indekserte samlinger som støtter liste-klassen.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows an example of how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> stores the items of the ListBox as well as their selection state within an example ListBox.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser et eksempel på hvordan <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>lagrer elementene i listen som sin utvalget tilstand i et eksempel liste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item|Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |0|object1|Unselected| |1|object2|Selected| |2|object3|Unselected| |3|object4|Selected| |4|object5|Selected| Based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> shown in the previous table, this table shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> would appear.
trans-unit.target: | Indeksen | Elementet | Utvalget tilstand i liste | |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |&0; | object1 | Umerket | |&1; | object2 | Valgt | |&2; | object3 | Umerket | |&3; | object4 | Valgt | |&4; | object5 | Valgt | Basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>vises i tabellen, denne tabellen viser hvordan <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>skal ligge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Item| |-----------|----------| |0|object2| |1|object4| |2|object5| Based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> shown in the previous table, this table shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> would appear.
trans-unit.target: | Indeksen | Elementet | |-----------|----------| |&0; | object2 | |&1; | object4 | |&2; | object5 | Basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>vises i tabellen, denne tabellen viser hvordan <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>skal ligge.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: |Index|Index of item| |-----------|-------------------| |0|1| |1|3| |2|4| The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class enables you to add items to the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: | Indeksen | Indeksen for elementet | |-----------|-------------------| |&0; |&1; | |&1; |&3; | |&2; |&4; | Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>klassen gjør det mulig å legge til elementer i listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method can accept any object when adding a member to the ListBox.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>metoden tar et objekt ved å legge til et medlem i listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: When an object is being added to the ListBox, the control uses the text defined in the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method of the object unless a member name within the object is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når et objekt som legges til i listen, bruker kontrollen teksten er definert i den <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>metoden for objektet med mindre en medlemsnavnet i objektet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to adding items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class you can also add items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til å legge til elementer ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>klassen som du kan også legge til ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you have a ListBox, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> on a base Windows form and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived Windows form, the string collections of those controls in the base Windows form must be empty.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du har en liste <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>på en base Windows-skjema og ønsker å endre streng samlinger av kontrollene i et avledet Windows-skjema streng samlinger av kontrollene formatet base Windows må være tom.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another Windows form.
trans-unit.target: Hvis strengen samlingene er tomme, blir de skrivebeskyttet når du avledet en annen Windows-formen.

trans-unit.source: Maintains performance while items are added to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> one at a time by preventing the control from drawing until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Opprettholder ytelse mens elementer legges til i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> samtidig ved å hindre at kontrollen tegning før den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate*>-metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: Den foretrukne måten å legge til flere elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>klassen (via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan legge til en matrise av elementene i listen i én enkelt operasjon.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the BeginUpdate method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis du vil legge til elementer en etter en tid som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>klasse, kan du bruke metoden BeginUpdate til å hindre at kontrollen oppdatering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>hver gang et element som er lagt til i listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fullført arbeidsoppgaven for å legge til elementer i listen, kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>metode for å aktivere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>skal oppdateres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: Denne måten å legge til elementer kan forhindre at flickered tegning av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>når et stort antall elementer som legges til i listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of border that is drawn around the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjetypen vises rundt den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Unselects all items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Opphever merkingen av alle elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property to negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden, tilsvarer innstillingen det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen negative én (-1).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly unselect all items in the list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden for raskt fjerner du merkingen for alle elementene i listen.

trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of columns in a multicolumn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden på kolonnene i en med flere kolonner <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you set the value to zero (0), a default width is assigned to each column.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir verdien til null (0), er en standardbredden tilordnet hver kolonne.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns the current width of each column in the list.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er en med flere kolonner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, denne egenskapen returnerer gjeldende bredde for hver kolonne i listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to ensure that each column in a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> can properly display its items.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å sikre at hver kolonne i en med flere kolonner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>riktig visning av elementene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of each column in the control.
trans-unit.target: Bredden på hver kolonne i kontrollen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: A value less than zero is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er tilordnet en verdi som er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the item collection.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av elementsamlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> that represents the new item collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>som representerer det nye elementsamlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppretting av nødvendige parameterne når kontrollen referansen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> som inneholder de nødvendige oppretting parameterne når håndtaket for kontrollen som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the tabs between the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter bredden på kategoriene mellom elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The integer array contains the tab spaces in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: Heltallsmatrisen inneholder kategorien mellomrom i stigende rekkefølge.

trans-unit.source: A collection of integers representing the tab widths.
trans-unit.target: En samling med heltall som representerer bredden på kategorien.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default item height for an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir standard elementet høyde for en eier tegnes <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardstørrelsen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en visual del av en eier tegnes <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> endringer.

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er brukt av en eier tegnes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The event is only raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed` or `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen er bare aktiveres når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>er satt til `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed` eller `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å utføre oppgaver som er nødvendig for å tegne elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable-sized item (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`), before drawing an item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har en variabel størrelse elementet (når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>er satt til `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`), før tegning av et element i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the DrawItem event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>-hendelsen for å angi størrelsen på elementet som du skal tegne i hendelsesbehandlingen for hendelsen DrawItem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegnemodus for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref> values representing the mode for drawing the items of the control.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"> </xref> verdiene som representerer modus for å tegne elementene for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawMode.Normal" name="DrawMode.Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_DrawMode.Normal" name="DrawMode.Normal" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet egenskapen er ikke medlem av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: A multicolumn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> cannot have a variable-sized height.
trans-unit.target: En med flere kolonner <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> kan ikke ha en variabel størrelse høyde.

trans-unit.source: Resumes painting the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control after painting is suspended by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: Gjenopptar malingen fullføres den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollerer når malingen fullføres er deaktivert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate*>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: Den foretrukne måten å legge til elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er å bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>klassen (via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan legge til en matrise av elementene i listen om gangen.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis du vil legge til elementer en etter en tid som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>klasse, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>metode for å hindre at kontrollen for oppdatering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>hver gang et element som er lagt til i listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the EndUpdate method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fullført arbeidsoppgaven for å legge til elementer i listen, kalle metoden EndUpdate å aktivere den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>skal oppdateres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: Denne måten å legge til elementer kan forhindre at flickered tegning av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>når et stort antall elementer som legges til i listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Finner det første elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> som starter med den angitte strengen.

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Søket utføres på denne måten skiller.

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: Søket leter etter ord som samsvarer med den angitte søkeegenskapslisten strengparameteren, delvis `s`.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å søke etter det første elementet som samsvarer med den angitte strengen.

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du utføre oppgaver som fjerner elementet som inneholder tekst ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>metoden eller endre teksten til elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the version of the FindString method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Når du har funnet den angitte teksten, hvis du vil søke etter andre forekomster av teksten i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>kan du bruke versjonen av metoden FindString som gir en parameter for å angi en Start-indeks i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil søke etter et nøyaktig ord samsvar i stedet for en delvis samsvar, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: Teksten til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for det første elementet finnes. Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen forekomst blir funnet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the s parameter is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the item count.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den s parameteren er mindre enn-1 eller større enn eller likt elementantall.

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Finner det første elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> som starter med den angitte strengen.

trans-unit.source: The search starts at a specific starting index.
trans-unit.target: Søket starter på en bestemt startindeksen.

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Søket utføres på denne måten skiller.

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: Søket leter etter ord som samsvarer med den angitte søkeegenskapslisten strengparameteren, delvis `s`.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string at the specified starting index within the list of items for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å søke etter det første elementet som samsvarer med den angitte strengen i den angitte Start indeksen i listen over elementer for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du utføre oppgaver som fjerner elementet som inneholder tekst ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>metoden eller endre teksten til elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes når et anrop ble gjort med versjonen av denne metoden som ikke angir en startindeksen.

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: Når et innledende element ble funnet i listen, denne metoden brukes vanligvis til å finne flere forekomster av søketeksten ved å angi indeksplasseringen i den `startIndex` -parameteren for elementet etter den første fant forekomsten av søketeksten.

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil søke etter et nøyaktig ord samsvar i stedet for en delvis samsvar, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the search reaches the bottom of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, it continues searching from the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> back to the item specified by the `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når søket når bunnen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, den fortsetter å søke fra toppen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>tilbake til elementet som er angitt av den `startIndex` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: Teksten til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet før det første elementet skal søkes etter.

trans-unit.source: Set to negative one (-1) to search from the beginning of the control.
trans-unit.target: Satt til negativ én (-1) for å søke fra begynnelsen av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for det første elementet finnes. Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen forekomst blir funnet.

trans-unit.source: The startIndex parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.
trans-unit.target: Den startIndex parameteren er mindre enn null eller større enn eller lik verdien for egenskapen for klassen.

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> that exactly matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Finner det første elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> nøyaktig samsvar med den angitte strengen.

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Søket utføres på denne måten skiller.

trans-unit.source: The search looks for an exact match to the words specified in the search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: Søket leter etter nøyaktig samsvar med ord som er angitt i strengparameteren `s`.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å søke etter det første elementet som samsvarer med den angitte strengen.

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du utføre oppgaver som fjerner elementet som inneholder tekst ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>metoden eller endre teksten til elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the version of the FindStringExact method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Når du har funnet den angitte teksten, hvis du vil søke etter andre forekomster av teksten i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>kan du bruke versjonen av metoden FindStringExact som gir en parameter for å angi en Start-indeks i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil utføre delvis ord søket i stedet for å finne en bestemt ord, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: Teksten til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for det første elementet finnes. Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen forekomst blir funnet.

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> that exactly matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: Finner det første elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> nøyaktig samsvar med den angitte strengen.

trans-unit.source: The search starts at a specific starting index.
trans-unit.target: Søket starter på en bestemt startindeksen.

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Søket utføres på denne måten skiller.

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that exactly match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: Søket leter etter ord som passer nøyaktig strengparameter angitte søkeegenskapslisten `s`.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string at the specified starting index within the list of items for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å søke etter det første elementet som samsvarer med den angitte strengen i den angitte Start indeksen i listen over elementer for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or change the item's text.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du utføre oppgaver som fjerner elementet som inneholder tekst søk med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>metoden eller endre elementets.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes når et anrop ble gjort med versjonen av denne metoden som ikke angir en startindeksen.

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: Når et innledende element ble funnet i listen, denne metoden brukes vanligvis til å finne flere forekomster av søketeksten ved å angi indeksplasseringen i den `startIndex` -parameteren for elementet etter den første fant forekomsten av søketeksten.

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil utføre en del av ord søket i stedet for å finne en bestemt ord, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the search reaches the bottom of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, it continues searching from the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> back to the item specified by the `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når søket når bunnen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, den fortsetter å søke fra toppen av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>tilbake til elementet som er angitt av den `startIndex` parameteren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: Teksten til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet før det første elementet skal søkes etter.

trans-unit.source: Set to negative one (-1) to search from the beginning of the control.
trans-unit.target: Satt til negativ én (-1) for å søke fra begynnelsen av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir skriften for tekst som vises av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> å bruke teksten vises av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard er verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forgrunnsfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Forgrunnen <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: Standard er verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the height of an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer høyden på et element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is not set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, the value of the index parameter is ignored because all items in a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are the same size.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>ikke settes til `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, ignoreres verdien for parameteren indeksen fordi alle elementer i en standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>har samme størrelse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property when you are using an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to determine the size of any item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen når du bruker en eier tegnes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>ikke fastsette størrelsen på et element i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to return the height for.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet til å returnere høyde for.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på det angitte elementet i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The specified value of the index parameter is less than zero or greater than the item count.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien for den index parameteren er mindre enn null eller større enn elementantall.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle for an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer det avgrensende rektangelet for et element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the item specified in the `index` parameter is not visible, the rectangle returned by this method will be outside the visible portion of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis elementet er angitt i den `index` parameteren er ikke synlig, rektangelet returneres av denne metoden blir utenfor den synlige delen av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine the size and position of an item within the list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden ikke fastsette størrelsen og plasseringen av et element i listen.

trans-unit.source: To get the height of an item, especially a variable-height owner drawn list item, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente høyden på et element, spesielt en variabel høyde eieren tegnede listeelement, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of item whose bounding rectangle you want to return.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet som avgrensende rektangelet du vil returnere.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer det avgrensende rektangelet for det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.
trans-unit.target: Den index parameteren er mindre enn null eller større enn eller lik verdien for egenskapen for klassen.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> is scaled.
trans-unit.target: Henter grensene som den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> skaleres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to ensure that the requested height is scaled rather than the current height.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>klasse overstyring av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å sikre at den forespurte høyden skaleres i stedet for gjeldende høyden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som angir området som skal hente Vis grensene.

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Høyden og bredden på kontrollens område.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> som angir grensene for kontrollen skal brukes når du definerer størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerer grensene som skaleres kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om det angitte elementet er valgt.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly determine whether a specified item is selected.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden for raskt å finne ut om en bestemt vare er valgt.

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when a specific operation needs to be performed when a specific item in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is selected.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er nyttig når en bestemt operasjon skal utføres når et spesifikt element i flere-utvalg <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>velges.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item that determines whether it is selected.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet som bestemmer om den er valgt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified item is currently selected in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det angitte elementet er valgt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the property of the class.
trans-unit.target: Den index parameteren er mindre enn null eller større enn eller lik verdien for egenskapen for klassen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width by which the horizontal scroll bar of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> can scroll.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bredden som det vannrette rullefeltet for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> kan rulle.

trans-unit.source: This property only reports a useful value if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen rapporterer bare en verdi som er nyttig hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is smaller than the value of this property, the horizontal scroll bar horizontally scrolls items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bredden på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er mindre enn verdien for denne egenskapen, vannrette rullefeltet vannrett ruller elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is equal to or greater than this value, the horizontal scroll bar is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bredden på de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er lik eller større enn denne verdien vannrette rullefeltet er skjult.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is not dynamically updated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er ikke dynamisk oppdatert av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when the items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er nyttig når elementene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er trukket eieren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the owner drawn items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are 200 pixels wide, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is 60 pixels wide, the HorizontalExtent property would need to be set to 200 in order to scroll the right edge of the items into the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis eieren tegnes elementene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er 200 piksler, men <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er 60 piksler, HorizontalExtent-egenskapen må være satt til 200 for å rulle høyre kant av elementene i det synlige området kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, that the horizontal scroll bar can scroll the control.
trans-unit.target: Bredden i piksler, at det vannrette rullefeltet kan rulle kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a horizontal scroll bar is displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en vannrette rullefeltet vises i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The HorizontalScrollbar property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> should display a horizontal scroll bar when the width of items within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> extend beyond the right edge of the control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HorizontalScrollbar bestemmer om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>skal vises vannrett Rull coolbar når bredden på elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>går utover høyre kant av kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the scroll bar is automatically displayed based on the width of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, rullefeltet vises automatisk basert på bredden på elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, in order to properly display a horizontal scroll bar, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er en eier tegnes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, for å vise riktig vannrette rullefeltet, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display a horizontal scroll bar in the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis en vannrette rullefeltet i kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet i de angitte koordinatene.

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig å finne ut hvilke element finnes på en bestemt plassering i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å fastslå hvilke elementet i listen som er valgt når brukeren høyreklikker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `p` parameter of the IndexFromPoint method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av markøren kan fastslå og sendt til den `p` parameteren for metoden IndexFromPoint til å bestemme som element brukeren høyreklikket musen.

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du vise en hurtigmeny brukeren for å angi oppgaver og funksjoner som er basert på elementet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> object containing the coordinates used to obtain the item index.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> objektet som inneholder koordinatene brukes til å hente elementet indeksen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet på de angitte koordinatene; Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen forekomst blir funnet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet i de angitte koordinatene.

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item that is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig å finne ut hvilke elementer som er plassert på en bestemt plassering i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne metoden til å fastslå hvilke elementet i listen som er valgt når brukeren høyreklikker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `x` and `y` parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av markøren kan fastslå og sendt til den `x` og `y` parameterne for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>metoden for å bestemme som element brukeren høyreklikket musen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du vise en hurtigmeny brukeren for å angi oppgaver og funksjoner som er basert på elementet.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten for plasseringen til å søke.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten for plasseringen til å søke.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet på de angitte koordinatene; Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_ListBox.NoMatches" name="ListBox.NoMatches" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen forekomst blir funnet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should resize to avoid showing partial items.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal endre størrelse på å unngå viser delvis elementene.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, kontrollen skaleres automatisk for å sikre at et element delvis ikke vises.

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain the original size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde den opprinnelige størrelsen på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>basert på plasskrav skjemaet, Sett denne egenskapen til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> sizes are such that they show only whole items.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>er slik at de vises bare hele elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> to completely fill a docked area, set IntegralHeight to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>for å fylle hele et forankret område, WantDestinationQueue IntegralHeight `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This causes the control to completely fill the area, but the last item is not fully displayed.
trans-unit.target: Dette fører til at kontrollen til å fylle området, men det siste elementet vises ikke fullstendig.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> does not contain any items, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>ikke inneholder noen elementer denne egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The integral height is based on the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, rather than the client area height.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Heltallig høyden er basert på høyden på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, i stedet for klienten området høyden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: As a result, when the IntegralHeight property is set `true`, items can still be partially shown if scroll bars are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet når egenskapen IntegralHeight satt `true`, elementer kan fortsatt delvis vises om side-felt som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>er satt til `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, denne egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control resizes so that it does not display partial items; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen endrer størrelse og derfor vises ikke at den delvise elementer. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir høyden på et element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`, all items have the same height.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>er satt til `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`, alle elementer har samme høyde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, the ItemHeight property specifies the height of each item added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>er satt til `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, egenskapen ItemHeight angir høyden på hvert element som er lagt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because each item in an owner-drawn list can have a different height, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method to get the height of a specific item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi hvert element i en liste med eieren tegnes kan ha en annen høyde, kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>metode for å hente høyden på et bestemt element i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you use the ItemHeight property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with items of variable height, this property returns the height of the first item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker egenskapen ItemHeight på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>med elementer av variabel høyde, returnerer egenskapen høyden på det første elementet i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> item is 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Den maksimale høyden på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>elementet er 255 piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of an item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på et element i kontrollen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The ItemHeight property was set to less than 0 or more than 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ItemHeight ble satt til mindre enn 0 eller mer enn 255 piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the items of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to obtain a reference to the list of items that are currently stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan du skaffe en referanse til listen over elementer som er lagret i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add items, remove items, and obtain a count of the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Med denne referansen kan du legge til elementer, Fjern elementene og få et antall elementer i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the tasks that can be performed with the item collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om oppgaver som kan utføres med elementsamlingen den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>klasse referanse emner.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the items of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også redigere elementene i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property to add items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can view the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the Items property but you cannot add or remove items from the list using the methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>til å legge til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>kan du vise elementene i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>å bruke egenskapen elementer, men du ikke kan legge til eller fjern elementer i listen ved hjelp av metodene for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> representing the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>som representerer elementene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an owner-drawn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> is created and the sizes of the list items are determined.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en eier tegnes <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> opprettes og størrelsen på listeelementer fastsettes.

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to specify the size an item will be made before it is drawn in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en hendelsesbehandling for denne hendelsen til å angi størrelsen på et element vil bli gjort før den tegnes den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The event is only raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen er bare aktiveres når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>egenskapen settes til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum valid height of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> item is 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Den maksimale gyldige høyden på en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>elementet er 255 piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs.ItemHeight%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs> to a value greater than 255 when handling this event may yield unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs.ItemHeight%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs>til en verdi større enn 255 under behandling av denne hendelsen kan føre til uventede resultater.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MeasureItemEventArgs.ItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> supports multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> støtter flere kolonner.

trans-unit.source: A multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> places items into as many columns as are needed to make vertical scrolling unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: En med flere kolonner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>plasserer elementer i flere kolonner som kreves for å gjøre loddrett rulling unødvendige.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The user can use the keyboard to navigate to columns that are not currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan bruke tastaturet til å navigere til kolonner som ikke er synlig for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> property to `true` to display a horizontal scroll bar that enables the user to scroll to columns that are not currently shown in the visible region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>egenskapen `true` til å vise en vannrette rullefeltet som lar brukeren å bla til kolonner som ikke vises for øyeblikket i området som er synlig for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ColumnWidth%2A> property determines the width of each column.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ColumnWidth%2A>egenskapen bestemmer bredden på hver kolonne.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ColumnWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> supports multiple columns; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> støtter flere kolonner, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A multicolumn <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> cannot have a variable-sized height.
trans-unit.target: En med flere kolonner <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> kan ikke ha en variabel størrelse høyde.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no matches are found during a search.
trans-unit.target: Angir at fant ingen samsvar under et søk.

trans-unit.source: This constant is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> methods when no matching values are found in a search.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstant er returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>metoder når noen samsvarende verdier som finnes i et søk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>
