trans-unit.source: Gets the combined height of all items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter kombinert høyden på alle elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the height that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> needs to be sized to, in order to display every available item in the list and to avoid displaying vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan du bestemme høyden som den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>må størrelse til for å vise alle tilgjengelige elementer i listen og ikke viser loddrette linjer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the amount of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is large, sizing the control using the value of the PreferredHeight property might cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to be sized outside of the client area of the form or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> container.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mengden elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er stort, endrer størrelsen på kontroll med verdien for PreferredHeight egenskapen kan føre til at den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>Størrelse utenfor klientområdet i skjemaet eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>beholder.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The combined height, in pixels, of all items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Kombinert høyden på alle elementer i kontrollen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger kontrollen for å gjøre det klientområdet og tegne umiddelbart selve og alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the item contained at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer elementet finnes i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property is set and the property in the data source that is assigned to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> changes, use the RefreshItem method to update the value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>egenskapen er angitt og egenskapen i datakilden som er tilordnet til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>endringer, Bruk RefreshItem-metoden til å oppdatere verdien i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to refresh.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet til å oppdatere.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes all <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> items and retrieves new strings for them.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer alle <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> elementer og henter nye strenger for dem.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>egenskapen til standardverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>egenskapen til standardverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text displayed by the control is displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om teksten vises av kontrollen skal vises fra høyre mot venstre.

trans-unit.source: This property enables your menus to support languages that are written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan menyer å støtte språk som skrives fra høyre mot venstre.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, item text is displayed from right to left instead of the default left to right method.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, elementet melding fra høyre mot venstre i stedet for standarder fra venstre mot høyre-metoden.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Skaleres kontrollens plassering, størrelse, utfylling og margin.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: Faktorer som høyden og bredden på kontrollen skal skaleres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdi som angir grensene for kontrollen skal brukes når du definerer størrelsen og plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the vertical scroll bar is shown at all times.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om det loddrette rullefeltet vises til enhver tid.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollAlwaysVisible property indicates whether a vertical scroll bar is always displayed, even if the number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> does not require displaying the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ScrollAlwaysVisible angir om vises loddrette rullefeltet alltid, selv om hvor mange elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>krever ikke vises loddrette-feltet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> only shows a vertical scroll bar when there are enough items to warrant displaying.
trans-unit.target: Som standard en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>viser bare loddrette rullefeltet når det er nok elementer som er relevant for visning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, the ScrollAlwaysVisible property indicates that a horizontal scroll bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: For en med flere kolonner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, angir egenskapen ScrollAlwaysVisible vannrette rullefeltet vises.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A vertical scroll bar is never displayed regardless of the value of this property for a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: En loddrette rullefeltet vises aldri uavhengig av verdien for denne egenskapen for et med flere kolonner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the vertical scroll bar should always be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det loddrette rullefeltet må alltid; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zero-based index of the currently selected item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den nullbaserte indeksen for det valgte elementet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use this property to determine the index of the item that is selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: For en standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>kan du bruke denne egenskapen for å finne ut indeksen for elementet som er valgt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return the index to any selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er satt til enten `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` eller `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (som angir en sammensatt merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) og flere elementer er valgt i listen, kan denne egenskapen returnere indeksen til alle valgte elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a collection containing the indexes of all selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hente en samling som inneholder indeksene i alle valgte elementer i flere-utvalg <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente elementet som er valgt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>til å hente alle de valgte elementene i en sammensatt merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: En nullbaserte indeksen for det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: En verdi negativ én (-1) som returneres hvis ingen elementer er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the item count.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er mindre enn-1 eller større enn eller likt elementantall.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex*> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices*> collection has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <> </> *> egenskapen eller <> </> *> samlingen er endret.

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the selected index in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> has been changed.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en hendelsesbehandling for denne hendelsen til å bestemme når den valgte indeksen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when you need to display information in other controls based on the current selection in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være nyttig når du trenger å vise informasjon i andre kontroller basert på gjeldende utvalg i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use the event handler for this event to load the information in the other controls.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke hendelsesbehandlingen for denne hendelsen til å laste inn informasjonen i de andre kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, any change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> collection, including removing an item from the selection, will raise this event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName>, noen endre til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>samling, inkludert å fjerne et element fra det merkede området, vil hever denne hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [behandling og opprettet hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder de nullbaserte indeksene i alle valgte elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns a collection containing the indexes to all items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: For flere merkede områder <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>denne egenskapen returnerer en samling som inneholder indekser for alle elementer som er valgt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the index of the only selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: For en enkel merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>denne egenskapen returnerer en samling som inneholder ett enkelt element som inneholder indeksen for bare valgte elementet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items of the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan elementene i samlingen, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class provides a number of ways to reference selected items.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>klassen gir en rekke måter å referere til valgte elementene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the SelectedIndices property to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke egenskapen SelectedIndices til å hente indeksen posisjonen til det valgte elementet i en enkel merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the item that is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, instead of the index position of the item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente elementet som er valgt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, i stedet for indeksen posisjonen for elementet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property if you want to obtain all the selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>egenskapen Hvis du vil hente alle de valgte elementene i en sammensatt merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> containing the indexes of the currently selected items in the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>som inneholder indeksene i de valgte elementene i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently selected, an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen elementer er valgt, et tomt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>returneres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently selected item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use this property to determine which item is selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: For en standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>kan du bruke denne egenskapen for å finne ut hvilke element i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is set to either `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (which indicates a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) and multiple items are selected in the list, this property can return any selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er satt til enten `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` eller `SelectionMode.MultiExtended` (som angir en sammensatt merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>) og flere elementer er valgt i listen, denne egenskapen kan returnere valgte elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a collection containing all selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hente en samling som inneholder alle de valgte elementene i en sammensatt merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the index position of the currently selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente indeksen posisjonen til det valgte elementet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property to obtain all the selected indexes in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>til å hente alle de valgte indeksene i et sammensatt merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the current selection in the control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer gjeldende utvalg i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection containing the currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder de valgte elementene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns a collection containing all items that are selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: For flere merkede områder <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>denne egenskapen returnerer en samling som inneholder alle elementer som er valgt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns a collection containing a single element containing the only selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: For en enkel merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>denne egenskapen returnerer en samling som inneholder ett enkelt element som inneholder bare valgte elementet i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items of the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan elementene i samlingen, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class provides a number of ways to reference selected items.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>klassen gir en rekke måter å referere til valgte elementene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the SelectedItems property to obtain the currently selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke egenskapen SelectedItems til å hente det valgte elementet i en enkel merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain the index position of an item that is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, instead of the item itself, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil hente posisjonen indeksen for et element som er valgt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, i stedet for selve elementet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property if you want to obtain the index positions of all selected items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>egenskapen Hvis du vil hente indeksen posisjoner for alle valgte elementer i et sammensatt merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> containing the currently selected items in the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>som inneholder de valgte elementene i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method in which items are selected in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir metoden som elementer er valgt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The SelectionMode property enables you to determine how many items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> a user can select at one time and how the user can make multiple-selections.
trans-unit.target: SelectionMode-egenskapen kan du finne ut hvor mange elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>en bruker kan velge om gangen, og hvordan brukeren kan gjøre flere valg.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When the SelectionMode property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, pressing SHIFT and clicking the mouse or pressing SHIFT and one of the arrow keys (UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW) extends the selection from the previously selected item to the current item.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen SelectionMode er satt til `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`å trykke SKIFT og museklikk eller trykke FORSKYVES og ett av piltaster (pil pil, pil venstre og høyrepil) utvider utvalget fra det tidligere valgte elementet til gjeldende element.

trans-unit.source: Pressing CTRL and clicking the mouse selects or deselects an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Trykk CTRL og museklikk velger eller et element i listen, oppheves.

trans-unit.source: When the property is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple`, a mouse click or pressing the SPACEBAR selects or deselects an item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes til `SelectionMode.MultiSimple`, et museklikk eller trykke mellomrom velger eller et element i listen, oppheves.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_SelectionMode.One" name="SelectionMode.One" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_SelectionMode.One" name="SelectionMode.One" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Tilordnet verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir de angitte grensene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control increases and decreases by a multiple of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>kontrollen øker og reduseres med et multiplum av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If height is a number that is not a multiple of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>, the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> will change by the largest multiple that is less than height.
trans-unit.target: Hvis høyde er et tall som ikke er et multiplum av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>, høyden på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>endres av den største flere som er mindre enn høyde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the specified parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne som tilsvarer grensene ikke er inkludert i den angitte parameteren er vanligvis sendt med gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: For example, the `height`, `width`, or the `x` or `y` properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den `height`, `width`, eller `x` eller `y` egenskapene for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>egenskapen kan sendes i en referanse til den gjeldende forekomsten av kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Alle verdier som er sendt inn er imidlertid innfridd og brukes til kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The `specified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: Den `specified` parameteren representerer elementer vises <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>endret av programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `specified` parameter value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du endrer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>kontrollens, den `specified` parameterverdien er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `specified` parameter value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>justeres som svar på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>egenskapen, den `specified` parameterverdien er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>egenskapsverdien kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Sets the object with the specified index in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Angir objektet med den angitte indeksen i den utledede klassen.

trans-unit.source: The array index of the object.
trans-unit.target: Matriseindeksen for objektet.

trans-unit.source: The object.
trans-unit.target: Objektet.

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> and adds the specified items to the control.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner innholdet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> og legger til de angitte elementene i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to insert into the control.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av objekter å sette inn i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Selects or clears the selection for the specified item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Velger eller fjerne merkingen for det angitte elementet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to set the selection of items in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å angi utvalget av elementer i et sammensatt merking <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: To select an item in a single-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du velger et element i en én-utvalg <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> to select or clear the selection for.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> Velg eller fjern merkingen for.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to select the specified item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>velge det angitte elementet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified index was outside the range of valid values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte indeksen er utenfor området med gyldige verdier.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>-egenskap er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode*>

trans-unit.source: Sorts the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sorterer elementene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sort forces the collection to add each item back to itself if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Sorter tvinger samlingen for å legge til hvert element tilbake til seg selv om den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each item is then inserted into the correct position.
trans-unit.target: Deretter inn hvert element i den riktige plasseringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> are sorted alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om elementene i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> sorteres alfabetisk.

trans-unit.source: Use the Sorted property to automatically sort strings alphabetically in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Sorted-egenskapen for å sortere automatisk strenger alfabetisk i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: As items are added to a sorted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, the items are moved to the appropriate location in the sorted list.
trans-unit.target: Som elementer legges til en sorterte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, elementene flyttes til riktig plassering i den sorterte listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When adding items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, it is more efficient to sort the items first and then add new items.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til elementer for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, er det mer effektivt sortere elementene først for å legge til nye elementer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with its Sorted set to `true` should not be bound to data using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>med Sorted satt til `true` kan ikke bindes til data ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: To display sorted data in a bound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you should bind to a data source that supports sorting and have the data source provide the sorting.
trans-unit.target: Vis sorterte data i en grense <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, bør du binde til en datakilde som støtter sortering og har oppgi sorteringen-datakilde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if items in the control are sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementene i kontrollen sorteres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or searches for the text of the currently selected item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller søker etter tekst i det valgte elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is set to a string value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> searches for the item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that matches the specified text and selects the item.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien for denne egenskapen er satt til en strengverdi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>søker etter elementet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>som samsvarer med den angitte teksten, og velger elementet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to determine which items are currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å fastslå hvilke elementer for øyeblikket er valgt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is set to `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property returns the text of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>er satt til `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, denne egenskapen returnerer teksten for det valgte elementet første.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is not set to `SelectionMode.None`, this property returns the text of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>ikke er satt til `SelectionMode.None`, denne egenskapen returnerer teksten for det valgte elementet første.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text of the currently selected item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for det valgte elementet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Text*> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Text*>-egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the first visible item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for det første synlige elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the item with the index position zero (0) is at the top of the visible region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: I utgangspunktet er element med index posisjon null (0) på toppen av området som er synlig for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> have been scrolled, another item might be at the top of the control's display area.
trans-unit.target: Hvis innholdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>har blitt rullet, et annet element kan være på toppen av området for kontrollens visning.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> of the item that is currently positioned at the top of the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne til å hente indeksen i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>for elementet som for øyeblikket er plassert på toppen av det synlige området kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to position an item in the list at the top of the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å plassere et element i listen på toppen av området som er synlig for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first visible item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for det første synlige elementet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that states the control type, the count of items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control, and the Text property of the first item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>, if the count is not 0.
trans-unit.target: En streng som angir kontrollen skriver, antall elementer i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> kontroll og Text-egenskapen for det første elementet i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref>, hvis antallet er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> recognizes and expands tab characters when it draws its strings by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets*> integer array.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> gjenkjenner og utvider tabulatortegn når den trekker strengene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets*>heltallsmatrise.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.CustomTabOffsets*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> recognizes and expands tab characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> gjenkjenner og utvider tabulatortegn; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> can recognize and expand tab characters when drawing its strings.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> kan gjenkjenne og utvide tabulatortegn ved tegning av strengene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can expand tab characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen kan utvide tabulatortegn; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes the command message the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control receives from the top-level window.
trans-unit.target: Behandler kommandoen meldingen i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> kontroll mottar fra vinduet på øverste nivå.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> the top-level window sent to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> vinduet på øverste nivå er sendt til den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The list's window procedure.
trans-unit.target: I listen vindusprosedyre.

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this to add extra functionality, but should call the WndProc method on the base class to ensure that the list continues to function properly.
trans-unit.target: Arvede klasser kan overstyre denne for å legge til ekstra funksjonalitet, men må kalle metoden WndProc i basisklassen å sikre at listen fortsetter å fungere riktig.

trans-unit.source: A Windows Message Object.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for Windows-melding.
